Text:
The day after defeating Annerose, I'm sitting in the
reserved section soaking up the posh atmosphere.

(I didn't like it here at first, but now I find it nice
and useful. One word to the maids and they'll
bring me pretty much anything I want for free.)
(As it happens, I'm a big cream-and-sugar guy.)

(Turns out Mitsugoshi is still the only place that
can make coffee. Gotta hand it to 'em.)
(Tasty.)
Good morning.
Good morning.
Are you here to cheer on Claire today as well?
Uh, yeah. You're sitting here again?

I have a match later, so I had myself excused from
my official duties.
Hm? Is that coffee? It's quite popular at Mitsugoshi.

I do enjoy the aroma, but I'm not overly fond of
bitter flavors...

Maybe you could make it into coffee milk by adding
loads of cream and sugar?

It's a magic trick that makes all kinds of coffee
taste the same.
Magic...?
Oh, this is tasty.

("Eating breakfast in the deluxe suite with the
princess!" Bet that'd make some buzz online.)
My lady, your sword...
Is something wrong?
Who's that?
She's with me. Please come on in, Beatrix.
Beatrix the War Goddess?!
The legendary elf swordmaster!
Over here.

(Wow, being "War Goddess" and "swordmaster" sounds
pretty cool!)

(I wanna hear people say "That's the legendary
Shadow!" about me some day.)
(Huh? She's really gonna sit right here?)
It's been some time since you appeared in public.
It has. I'm looking for someone...

My niece who looks just like me. Has anyone
seen her?

I heard that elves have been seen in this
kingdom recently.
I can't recall seeing any.

Forgive me. I thought someone here might know the
person you seek.

(This might be the most side character-aligned
situation yet.)

(Nothing screams "extra" more than being
surrounded by named characters and getting to
take in all the action. I could get used to this.)

By the by, what of this year's festival? Are there
any competitors you have an eye on, Lady Beatrix?
Cid.
Cid?
Cid?!
I have my eye on Cid. I know he will become strong.
Nah, I think you got the wrong guy.

Even though he is a student at the academy... To be
honest, I cannot speak for his ability...

And I don't think there is any point in comparing him
to his sister, Claire Kagenou...
Kagenou... Ah, he must be that baldy's son!

Well, if Lady Beatrix thinks he merits watching, then
I'm...certain he must be.
Yes, we can only hope he amounts to something.
Could someone so blind really be the War Goddess?
Shh, everyone can hear you.

(I see. Seems like War Goddess isn't just a
fancy nickname.)

(Her form, her personality, her bearing, and her
strength as a whole are all so painfully plain
that nobody would've been able to sense her
true power.)

For the time being it looks as though Beatrix
has earned the respect of Princess Iris.
